title: Manage Port Preparations for a Coming Storm
description: A hurricane is forecast to approach the port. The emergency manager must coordinate preparations to secure the facility.

tasks.description: Monitor the storm's forecast track and intensity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager gets regular updates on the hurricane's expected arrival time and wind speed.

tasks.description: Instruct terminal operations to lower crane booms and add extra tie-downs to all cranes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Work orders are issued to secure all heavy equipment.

tasks.description: Order the evacuation of all vessels from their berths to safer anchorage offshore.
tasks.expected_outcome: The harbormaster communicates with all vessels and directs them to leave the port.
